org.trianacode.gui.action

Class MainTrianaKeyMapFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.action.MainTrianaKeyMapFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Actions

    public class MainTrianaKeyMapFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements Actions
    A class for building InputMap and ActionMap key binding classes.
